abstract: Advanced Micro Devices is doing what it can to keep from taking on water. Hurt by a bruising battle with Intel, A.M.D. agreed to sell off its handheld graphics business and multimedia assets to Qualcomm for $65 million.
lead_paragraph: Advanced Micro Devices is doing what it can to keep from taking on water. Hurt by a bruising battle with Intel, A.M.D. agreed to sell off its handheld graphics business and multimedia assets to Qualcomm for $65 million.

headline.main: AMD Sells Graphics Unit for $65 million

abstract: The layoffs come as the company grapples with a steep decline in demand for personal and business computers.
snippet: The layoffs come as the company grapples with a steep decline in demand for personal and business computers.
lead_paragraph: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.  With demand for its chips drying up at record rates, Intel has decided to shut down several plants and dismiss thousands of workers.

headline.main: Intel to Cut at Least 5,000 Jobs
headline.print_headline: Intel to Cut 5,000 Jobs and Shut Some Plants
